channel.title: Need help with Internet Explorer Compatibility

item.title: Need help with Internet Explorer Compatibility
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Heya, I am making this thingy basically because I haven’t made a web page in a while, basically it works like when you hover an item in maple except I haven’t made it um, dynamic yet.

Either way
The Horizontal Rule works perfectly in Firefox but not in Internet Explorer.

[code]

MapleStory Item Stats Viewer 
<body>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		function displayInfo(event) {
			document.getElementById('infoLayer').style.top  = (event.clientY + 15) + "px";
			document.getElementById('infoLayer').style.left = (event.clientX + 15) + "px";
		}
		
		function hideInfo() {
			document.getElementById('infoLayer').style.top = "-1000px";
		}
	</script>
	<div class="main" id="infoLayer" name="infoLayer">
		<span class="title" align="left">Weighted Earrings</span><br />
        <div class="none" style="height: 10px;"></div>
	  	<img src="http://global.hidden-street.net/items/images/eqs/ear004.gif" align="left" width="90" height="90" />
        <div class="smallfont">  REQ LEV: 20

REQ STR: 0
REQ DEX: 0
REQ INT: 0
REQ LUK: 0
REQ FAM: -


CATEGORY : GLOVE

NUMBER OF UPGRADES AVAILABLE : 5



[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Internet Explorer Compatibility
